summary: Adds a small quest like quest. a full new armor set and new weapons to the game !
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]The Mad Jester[/size]
-------------------------------
Adds:
- The mad jester Hat
- The mad jester gloves
- the mad jester clothes
- the mad jester boots
- the mad jester daggers x2
- the mad jester npc
- the mad jester house
-------------------------------
[size=4]How?[/size]
- go to dragonreach and go to the enchantre room. there is a closet on the left when you enter there will be
a note, read the note and you will find out more about the mad jester and where to get the set or watch pics.
- female and male version.
-------------------------------
Little story =
But I knew more, one night I saw a weird man walking in the night. He had a giant hat and a weird jester outfit. With a dagger I never saw before.

When I said to the guards there was a mad man on the Los they laughed at me and called me crazy. No man could murder so many.

But everything changed when they all saw him eating a child alive.... years gone by. and the mystery of the mad jester still remains. The people of Skyrim wanted to forget the tragedy they saw that day. even the guards say its all over its all gone.
But I know it will never end. He will return one day and kill again. That's why for who ever is reading this letter please search the mad jester and bring him to justice. asking anyone else will not help you. pleas believe me and find this lunatic.
-------------------------------
Thx to
- bethesda
- nifskope
- skyrim
- creation kit
- blender.
-------------------------------

sry for the bad english and enjoy !
